Title: Forbidden Kingdom
Writer: Nikolay Gogol (story and characters), Aleksandr Karpov (script), Gerard Michael MacCarthy (English adaptation,  additional material), Oleg Stepchenko (script)
Actors: Jason Flemyng, Andrey Smolyakov, Aleksey Chadov, Agniya Ditkovskite
Plot: An eighteenth century English cartographer, Jonathan Green, sets out on a journey to map the uncharted lands of Transylvania, only to discover the dark secrets and dangerous creatures hidden in a cursed, fantastical Romanian forest.
